source_sentence: 佛說療痔病經
translation: Foshuo healing hemorrhoids scripture

source_sentence: 大唐三藏義淨奉　制譯
translation: Translation of the Tripiṭaka of the Great Tang by Yijing Feng

source_sentence: 如是我聞：一時，薄伽梵在王舍大城竹林園中，與大苾芻眾五百人俱。
translation: Thus I have heard: One time, the Bhagavān was in the bamboo grove of the great city of Rājagṛha with a great congregation of 500 monks.

source_sentence: 時，有眾多苾芻身患痔病，形體羸瘦、痛苦縈纏，於日夜中，極受憂惱。
translation: At the time, a large number of those monks were suffering from a hemorrhoidal disease, and their bodies were so thin and tattered with pain that they were in great distress day and night.

source_sentence: 時，具壽阿難陀見是事已，詣世尊所，頂禮雙足，在一面立，白言：「世尊！
translation: When Kauṣṭhila Ānanda saw this, he went to the Bhagavān, bowed his head at his feet, stood to one side, and said, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 今王舍城多有苾芻身患痔病，形體羸瘦、痛苦縈纏，於日夜中，極受憂惱。
translation: Many monks in Rājagṛha are suffering from a hemorrhoidal disease, which makes their bodies weak and painful, and they spend their days and nights in extreme distress.

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 此諸痔病，云何救療？」
translation: How can these hemorrhoids be treated?"

source_sentence: 佛告阿難陀：「汝可聽此《療痔病經》，讀誦受持、繫心勿忘，亦於他人，廣為宣說，此諸痔病，悉得除差。
translation: The Buddha told Ānanda, "You may listen to this Sutra on Healing Hemorrhoids, recite it, memorize it, bind your mind to it, and explain it widely to others, for all these hemorrhoids will be removed.

source_sentence: 所謂：風痔、熱痔、癊痔、三合痔、血痔、腹中痔、鼻內痔、齒痔、舌痔、眼痔、耳痔、頂痔、手足痔、脊背痔、屎痔……遍身支節所生諸痔，如是痔瘻，悉皆乾燥、墮落、消滅，畢差無疑。
translation: They are: wind hemorrhoids, fever hemorrhoids, phlegm hemorrhoids, triple hemorrhoids, bloody hemorrhoids, abdominal hemorrhoids, internal nasal hemorrhoids, dental hemorrhoids, tongue hemorrhoids, eye hemorrhoids, ear hemorrhoids, parietal hemorrhoids, hand and foot hemorrhoids, spinal hemorrhoids, fecal hemorrhoids ... all of the hemorrhoids that arise from the limbs of the body, such as these, all dry up, fall down, and disappear, without any doubt.

source_sentence: 皆應誦持如是神呪。」
translation: You should all recite and uphold this divine spell."

source_sentence: 即說呪曰：「怛姪他　揭賴米　室利　室利　魔揭室至　三磨[革*夭]都　莎訶「此呪(丹藏云)：「怛姪他　頞闌帝　頞藍謎　室利鞞　室里室里　磨羯失質　三婆跋覩　莎訶「阿難陀！
translation: 即說呪曰：「怛姪他　揭賴米　室利　室利　魔揭室至　三磨[革*夭]都　莎訶「此呪(丹藏云)：「怛姪他　頞闌帝　頞藍謎　室利鞞　室里室里　磨羯失質　三婆跋覩　莎訶「阿難陀！

source_sentence: 於此北方，有大雪山王。
translation: To the north of here, there's the great snow-capped king of mountains.

source_sentence: 中有大莎羅樹，名曰『難勝』。
translation: In its midst is a great sala tree named 'Nāgârjuna.'

source_sentence: 有三種華：一者初生、二者圓滿、三者乾枯。
translation: It has three kinds of flowers: one that first grows, two that are full, and three that dry up.

source_sentence: 猶如彼華，乾燥落時，我諸痔病亦復如是，勿復血出，亦勿膿流，永除苦痛，悉皆乾燥。
translation: Just like that flower, when it dries up and falls, so do my hemorrhoids, which don't bleed out again and don't leak pus, permanently remove pain, and all dry up.

source_sentence: 又復若常誦此經者，得宿住智，能憶過去七生之事。
translation: Furthermore, if someone always recites this sūtra, they'll attain knowledge of past lives and be able to recall the events of the past seven lives.

source_sentence: 呪法成就，莎訶。」
translation: The spell is complete, sahā."

source_sentence: 又說呪曰：「怛姪他　占米　占米　捨占米　占沒儞　捨占泥　莎訶」佛說是經已，時，具壽阿難陀及諸大眾，皆大歡喜，信受奉行。
translation: He also spoke the dhāraṇī, saying, "Tāmaṇerī, Ṛjamī, Śājamī, Śāmbūnī, and Śājamnī," and when the Buddha spoke this sūtra, Kauṣṭhila Ānanda and the whole assembly rejoiced greatly, believed, and approved.

source_sentence: 佛說療痔病經
translation: Sutra on Healing Hemorrhoids
